name: 7 Good Minutes Daily Self-Improvement
what_you_do: 7 Good Minutes is a daily self-improvement podcast that provides bite-sized content focused on mindfulness, gratitude, and maintaining a positive mindset to inspire listeners to become the best version of themselves.
who_you_serve: The podcast targets high achievers and individuals seeking personal growth and self-improvement, catering to a broad audience interested in enhancing their mental health and productivity.
service_provided: daily podcasts, articles, resource reviews, community support
business_focus: 7 Good Minutes is a daily self-improvement podcast that provides bite-sized content focused on mindfulness, gratitude, and maintaining a positive mindset to inspire listeners to become the best version of themselves.
